title: Circuit protection and identification
fullText:
Semi-enclosed rewireable fuses shall not be used for the protection of final sub-circuits supplying medical electrical equipment in home care installations.
Final sub-circuits supplying medical electrical equipment shall be legibly and indelibly identified: 'SUITABLE FOR MEDICAL USE'.
NOTES:
1	This identification requirement need not apply where a Type 1, 10 mA portable or in line RCD, or a PSOA in accordance with Clause 5.2.3.1(iii) is being used.
2	The requirements of Clauses 2.7.3, 2.7.4, 2.8.2, 2.8.4, 2.8.5, 2.8.6 and 2.12.2 need not apply for home care installations.
